<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Cruelty](/Feats.aspx?ID=1677) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cruelty](/Feats.aspx?ID=1673)

</column>

---

The extent of the corruption within you does more than simply sap your foes' strength, it devastates their minds and reflexes. When you use [Cruelty](/Feats.aspx?ID=1673), choose whether you want to make the creature [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) as normal, to make it [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) on a failed save (clumsy 2 on a critical failure), or to make it [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) on a failed save (stupefied 2 on a critical failure).
name: Greater Cruelty
